page.title: 17LOCAL SHOPPING SURVEY
page.content:
Shopping in Heaton Chapel _________________________
{Shopping}plays an important part in our everyday life. Manchester and Stockport have extensive shopping facilities but we try to use our{local {shops}in Heaton Chapel.
We{interviewed}many local people. They all shopped in Stockport, but only half went to into Manchester. Nearly everyone shopped locally, often making {several journeys}during the week.
We counted{seventy-one shops and {businesses.}When asked about improving the area, many people suggested a{shoe {shop}and wished the shops to remain {open at lunchtime.}They also wanted easier and safer{crossing places}for {pedestrians.
